translation.en: You guys, just start without me.
Well, now I'm ready for a rematch.
500 years in the Spirit Realm, you pick up a thing or two.
I have taken the chi of every master here.
translation.ko: 난 영혼계 모든 사부의 기를 차지했어

translation.en: And soon I will have your power, too.
When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
translation.ko: 아직도 몰라? 욕심이 클수록 많이 잃는 법

translation.en: With your chi, I will finally be able to return to the mortal world.
translation.ko: 네 기를 뺏으면 난 인간계에 갈 수 있어

translation.en: And this time, you won't be there to stop me.
It was never my destiny to stop you.
translation.ko: 널 막는 건 내 운명이 아녔어

translation.en: I have set another on that path.
translation.ko: 널 막을 자를 난 이미 심어놓았지

translation.en: Justice is about to be served!
We'll have two Justice Platters, please.

translation.ko: - 세 접시 - 세 접시요 두부 튀김 추가요!

translation.en: Oh, the spicy noodle soup for Tigress. Did you want extra sauce with that?
She wants it on the side.
Go, Dragon Warrior! You can do it!
translation.ko: 용의 전사, 넌 할 수 있어

translation.en: You guys aren't doing the Dramatic Pose, are you?
Do we have to strike a pose every time we land?
You guys, never underestimate the power of a dramatic entrance.
translation.ko: 극적인 등장의 힘을 얕보면 안 돼

translation.en: I've heard about some masters who can win a fight just by throwing open a door.
translation.ko: 어떤 사부는 문만 꽝 찼는데 결투가 끝났어

translation.en: Really? I was just making, uh...
Yeah. I mean, yeah. I am.
Before the battle of the fist comes the battle of the mind.
Nice dramatic entrance. What's the occasion?
Today will be my final class.
I didn't even know you were sick! Although you have been looking a little...
translation.ko: 아프신 줄 몰랐어요 요새 안색이 조금...

translation.en: A little healthy. A lot, actually.
My final class, because from now on your training will be in the hands
translation.ko: 마지막 수업인 이유는 앞으로 용의 전사가 5인방을 지도할 거니까!

translation.en: Me, teach? I mean, why not Tigress? She's always telling everyone what to do.
translation.ko: 제가요? 이래라저래라 하는 건 타이그리스 전문이잖아요

translation.en: -Be quiet, Po. -You see what I mean?
Tigress is not the Dragon Warrior. You are.
Come on, they're the Five. What could I teach them?
There is always something more to learn, even for a master.
translation.ko: 배움에는 끝이 없어 사부도 예외는 아니지

translation.en: For instance, let me show you another move...
translation.ko: 예를 들어 다른 동작 하나를 보여주마

translation.en: All you have to lose is our respect.
I mean, seriously, how bad can it be?
Okay, okay. Let's switch it up.
I mean, ah... Tigress, Tornado Back Flip!
Crane, go high. I mean low! Low!
Viper and Tigress, do, like, a Totem Pole Poison Technique!
Uh, you two, do a Swarming Insect Bite
with a Yellow Tail, Yellow Jacket, Spicy Tuna...
translation.ko: 노란 꼬리로 콧등 찔러 부리로 눈알 찔러

translation.en: Did you at least learn a little something?
And Tigress is flammable, it turns out.
[goose 1] Yeah, that was a complete disaster.
[goose 2] Ugh... I'm glad we're not Po right now.

translation.ko: 우리가 한 말 들은 거 같아

translation.en: Uh, he said you're a loser.
How was your first day teaching?
Who told you? Did Tigress tell you?
I heard from Monkey, and Crane, and Mantis,
and your dad, and Mrs. Chow from the gift shop,
translation.ko: 그리고 네 아빠 선물 가게 차우 여사

translation.en: and those ducks you just passed,
Did she also tell you that it'll never happen again? Because I'm done.
translation.ko: 첫 수업이 마지막이란 말도 하던가요? 전 끝이에요

translation.en: Both! I don't know why you ever thought I could teach that class.
translation.ko: 둘 다요! 어째서 제가 가르칠 수 있다고 생각하셨죠?

translation.en: What? You set me up to fail? Why?
translation.ko: 네? 그럼 알면서도 일부러 시킨 거예요?

translation.en: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 것만 하면 발전할 수 없어

translation.en: I don't wanna be more! I like who I am.
translation.ko: 더 발전하기 싫어요 지금의 제가 좋은걸요

translation.en: You don't even know who you are.
What do you... Of course, I do. I'm the Dragon Warrior.
And what exactly does that mean, Dragon Warrior?
It means, you know, just going around and punching and kicking.
translation.ko: 밖에 나가 주먹으로 치고 발로 차며

translation.en: You think that is what the great Master Oogway saw for you?
translation.ko: 대사부님이 그런 재능만 높게 쳤던 걸까?

translation.en: A 500-year prophecy fulfilled so you could spend your days kicking butt
and running through town high-fiving bunnies?
Oogway saw greatness in you, Po. Against my better judgment.
translation.ko: 대사부님은 너의 위대함을 보셨어 난 아니라고 했지만

translation.en: More than you can see in yourself.
translation.ko: 넌 네가 생각하는 것보다 훨씬 대단해

translation.en: Power beyond anything you can imagine.
The energy that flows through all living things.
So you're saying if I teach, I'll be able to do cool stuff like that?
translation.ko: 제가 잘 가르치면 저도 할 수 있어요?

translation.en: No. I'm saying if you teach, I'll be able to do cool stuff like that.
translation.ko: 아니, 네가 가르치는 동안 내가 기를 더 키우겠단 뜻!

translation.en: Mastering chi requires mastery of self.
translation.ko: 기를 터득하려면 자기 자신부터 알아야 해

translation.en: Oogway sat alone in a cave for 30 years asking one question.
I'm lucky if I get five minutes before you interrupt...
[groans] So now I have to sit alone in a cave for 30 years?
translation.ko: 네가 딱 5분만 안 끼어들면 난... 저보고 30년간 동굴에 있으라고요?

translation.en: Teaching? There's no way I'm ever gonna be like you.
I'm not trying to turn you into me.
I'm trying to turn you into you.
Turn me into me? Wait a second, that makes no...
Just a little more confusing and you'll be the next Oogway.
Sorry, no offense, Master Oogway. I just...
translation.ko: 나쁜 뜻은 없었어요 대사부님, 전 단지...

translation.en: I'll let you get back to your eternal peace.
If I stepped on you, would you die?
You hear that, Oogway? I'm back.
The Jade Slayer. Master of Pain.
translation.ko: 내가 바로 제이드 킬러 고통을 주는 자

translation.en: You may know me as the Beast of Vengeance.
Okay, I used to work with Oogway.
Now, he was a great warrior.
Find Oogway's students, and bring them to me.
By the time I am done with them, Oogway,
there will be no one left who will even remember your name.
translation.ko: 아무도 네 이름을 기억 못 할 거다

translation.en: Teach me? Oh, no! It's the Dragon Teacher!
Ah! No! Please don't teach me to death!
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 죽을 정도로 훈련시키진 마세요

translation.en: I was just, uh, stopping by for a little soak.
Nothing? I come home to find you taking a bath with your dolls...
...and instead of adding bath salts to the water, you just added Szechuan peppercorns.
translation.ko: 방금 욕조에 목욕 소금 대신 사천 고추를 탔어

translation.en: There, there, son. You tell your daddy all about it.
Shifu says I don't know what it means to be the Dragon Warrior.
translation.ko: 시푸 사부님이 저한테 용의 전사가 뭔지 모른대요

translation.en: Now I have to be a teacher?
I thought I finally knew who I was. If I'm not the Dragon Warrior, who am I?
translation.ko: 이제서야 제가 누군지 알게 됐는데 용의 전사가 아니면 전 누구인 거죠?

translation.en: And, someday when you're in charge of the whole Jade Palace
I can sell noodles in the lobby!
Why are you still here taking a bath like a baby?
Get out! Get up! Go, go, go!
translation.ko: 어서 나가! 우리도 분점을 내는 거야

translation.en: But what about the Dragon Warrior look-alike contest?
Oh, Mrs. Chow always wins that.
And the Dragon Warrior dumpling-eating contest? I have to defend my title.
translation.ko: 만두 먹기 대회는요? 우승 타이틀을 지켜야죠

translation.en: No one's gonna beat your dumpling-eating record.
Someone's about to beat your dumpling-eating record!
I hope you find your son.
And I hope you find your father.
Oh, my gosh, it is you!
Well, don't just stand there. Give your old man a hug!
translation.ko: 가만히 있지 말고 와서 꼭 안아다오!

translation.en: I thought I lost you forever, Little Lotus.
translation.ko: 영영 못 찾는 줄 알았다 작은 연꽃

translation.en: Uh, okay. This is very embarrassing but I think you've got me confused
translation.ko: 있잖아요, 민망해서 그런데요 팬더 이름이 연꽃이 뭐예요?

translation.en: with a panda named Lotus. My name is Po.
translation.ko: 팬더 이름이 연꽃이 뭐예요? 제 이름은 포예요

translation.en: Oh, right, you wouldn't know. Okay.
translation.ko: 아, 맞다 알 턱이 없겠지 태어났을 때 네 이름이란다 작은 연꽃

translation.en: See, Little Lotus was the name you were given at birth.
translation.ko: 태어났을 때 네 이름이란다 작은 연꽃

translation.en: I can't believe it! After all these years, you're really here?
Oh, Dad! Come! Say hi to...
I don't know what I'm supposed to call you.
I'm pretty sure he said his name is Li.
Thank you, thank you, for taking such good care of my son.
Your son? Now, hold on just a minute.
How do we know this stranger is even related to you?
translation.ko: 이 수상한 분이 아빤지 뭘 보고 장담해?

translation.en: -Our bellies could be brothers! -That is so cool.
Hey, son, let me teach you how to belly gong.
-All right. Belly gong. -They jiggle the same!

translation.ko: - 똥배 치기! - 똑같이 출렁거려요 - 출렁출렁! - 거울 보는 거 같지?

translation.en: [Li] It's like looking in a fat mirror.
I can't believe we're taking a picture together.
I thought Po was the only panda left.
Oh, no. There's a whole bunch of us.
A secret panda village in the mountains.
translation.ko: 산속에 아무도 모르는 비밀 팬더 마을이 있어

translation.en: But how did you know where I was?
translation.ko: 제가 있는 곳은 어떻게 아신 거예요?

translation.en: I received a message that led me here.
How could you receive a message if no one could find you?
translation.ko: 아무도 모르는 곳에 누가 메시지를 보냈죠?

translation.en: No, it was a message from the universe.
Now, what's all this about a Dragon Warrior?
How did you know I was a Dragon Warrior? Did the universe tell you that, too?
No, the poster did. And the gift shop.
You have no idea. There's so much to show you.
translation.ko: 그게 다가 아니에요 보여드릴 게 무척 많아요

translation.en: You're gonna be so awesomely proud.
Do you have panda asthma, too?
Does that run in the family?
It's, like, the coolest thing ever.
This is the Hall of Heroes.
Home of the most priceless kung fu artifacts in all of China!
You were gonna say "awesome," right? Because it totally is!
translation.ko: 짱이라고 하려고 했죠? 왜냐면 진짜로 짱이거든요!

translation.en: Like the Urn of Whispering Warriors. Someone broke that once.
This is Master Flying Rhino's battle armor!
I wonder if I could fit in that.
Get out of my head, Dad! I've wondered the same thing!
translation.ko: 우와! 저도 방금 같은 생각 했어요

translation.en: -If I could fit in it? -If you could? No, if I could fit.
translation.ko: 내 몸에 맞을지를? 아뇨! 제 몸에 맞을지를요!

translation.en: Master Ram's crossbow, the infamous Gate Smasher.
translation.ko: 숫양 사부의 석궁 살벌한 성문 파괴기

translation.en: Dad, look at this! The battle helmets of Master Rat's army.
translation.ko: 이것도 봐요 쥐 사부 군대 투구예요 완전 작아요
쥐 사부 군대 투구예요 완전 작아요

translation.en: Master Dolphin's waterproof armor! This is my favorite.
translation.ko: 돌고래 사부 방수 갑옷! 제가 제일 좋아하죠

translation.en: Check it out. It's the legendary battle rickshaw of Emperor Hawk.
translation.ko: 이건 매 황제의 전설적인 전투 인력거

translation.en: Dad, what are you doing? We're not supposed to touch anything!
translation.ko: 뭐 하시는 거예요? 함부로 건드리면 안 돼요

translation.en: Oh! Sorry, sorry. Should I put it back?
Do the hinges hinge? Does it smell like rhino?
translation.ko: 장인의 손길이 느껴져요? 코뿔소 냄새도 나요?

translation.en: Does it feel like you're impenetrable?
Does it feel like you could take on a thousand warriors

translation.ko: 털끝 하나 안 다칠 자신 있어요?

translation.en: I wonder what this does. I should pull it.
I think I just peed a little.
Anything else we should try in here, son?
translation.ko: 아들, 또 가지고 놀 만한 거 없을까?

translation.en: Here we go! Go, go, go!
-I'm going high! -There you go. Come on, throw it!
I'm gonna get you. I am gonna get you!
I'm gonna get you, I'm gonna get you! I'm gonna get you.
Who's got you? Who's gonna get you?
Who's gonna get you? Yeah. Who's gonna get you?
You're never gonna guess who just showed up. Not in a million years.
translation.ko: 누가 나타났는지 정말 상상도 못 할걸?

translation.en: Whoa! How did you just guess that?
Oh, wait a second. Yeah, of course. We look exactly the same.
Dad, say hi to my friends.
Mantis, Tigress, Monkey, Crane, and Viper.
translation.ko: 맨티스, 타이그리스, 몽키 크레인, 그리고 바이퍼

translation.en: They're kind of my best friends. And this...
Uh... It is an honor to meet you, Master Panda.
Perhaps your father would care to join us in the training hall.
translation.ko: 아버지도 네가 훈련하는 모습을 보고 싶어 하실 거야

translation.en: Your son will be teaching the class.
I'm sure he's tired. I'm sure you're tired. He's tired.
translation.ko: 아빠 피곤하실 거예요 그렇죠, 아빠? 피곤하시대요

translation.en: I'm gonna show him to the Chrysanthemum Suite.
What, tired? No, I'm fine. I would love to watch you teach.
translation.ko: 하나도 안 피곤해! 네가 가르치는 거 보고 싶구나

translation.en: Trust me, it'll be more fun just to watch me...
Now you can see what being the Dragon Warrior's all about!
Enemies of justice, prepare for war!
What's the deal with the green guys?
It's okay, Dad, I do this every day!
The Master Badger Twins, with their Crushing Double-Gong technique!
translation.ko: 쌍쌍 타격의 대가 오소리 쌍둥이 사부

translation.en: And that guy is... No! Master Porcupine!
I thought he died a hundred years ago.
Get a quick sketch of us.
Did you get it? Did you get it?
I'm being choked by Master Porcupine. This is so cool.
"Message from the universe." I'll give you a message from the universe.
Sorry, Dad. I'll clean up later.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Not my good pan! Take this one.
Dad, check out my Dumplings of Doom.
Your chi will soon be mine.
-Is he talking to me? -Which one? They're all talking.
translation.ko: - 나한테 말한 거야? - 누구? 전부 말하잖아

translation.en: Whoa. You're right. That's so scary.
We should try that, too. Maybe it'd be scary back at them.
Okay, but we gotta plan what we're gonna say first.
Otherwise, it won't be scary. It'll just be stupid.
It's not them talking, you idiots!
translation.ko: 좀비들이 말하는 게 아냐 이 멍청이들아!

translation.en: It's me talking through them. Kai!
The green smoke, just poof! And then poof!
There's so much wisdom in here, I can't find anything.
All the answers will be found within.
translation.ko: 모든 답이 이 안에 있을 거야

translation.en: Are you kidding me? Not again.
It is written in Oogway's hand.
"in arms. In arms." Sorry. He says, "Brother-in-arms."
translation.ko: 형제 말고... 미안 형제 같은 동지

translation.en: Maybe you should just unroll it all at once?
"I was an ambitious young warrior leading a great army."
translation.ko: 난 막강한 군대를 이끄는 젊고 용감한 전사였다

translation.en: And fighting by my side was Kai...
My friend carried me for days, looking for help...
translation.ko: 그는 며칠씩 날 안고 도움을 찾아 헤맸어

translation.en: until we came to a secret village
Pandas who used the power of chi to heal me.
They taught me how to give chi.
But Kai wanted the power all to himself.
translation.ko: 근데 카이가 그 힘을 독차지하려 했지

translation.en: He saw that what could be given could also be taken.
translation.ko: 생명을 주는 힘이 생명을 뺏는다는 것도 봤던 거야

translation.en: until, finally I banished Kai to the Spirit Realm.
Should he ever return to the mortal realm,
he can only be stopped by a true master of chi.
translation.ko: 오직 기를 가진 사부만이 막을 수 있어

translation.en: Me? I can barely make a flower bloom.
I need at least 30 more years, and a cave.
[Shifu] He will continue stealing the chi of masters until he has consumed it all.
translation.ko: 놈이 모든 사부의 기를 차지하려 할 거야

translation.en: [Viper] We have to think of a way to stop him!
[Crane] He'll get more and more powerful with every master he defeats.
translation.ko: 사부를 꺾을 때마다 더 강해질 거예요

translation.en: [Tigress] There is no choice. We fight.
That must be why the universe sent you here!
Okay, so what do I have to do?
You have to come home with me.
You must rediscover what it is to be a panda.
You have to learn to live like a panda, sleep like a panda,
I've always felt like I wasn't eating up to my full potential.
translation.ko: 항상 더 먹을 수 있다고 생각했었어요

translation.en: No, you can't take Po away from me. No, no.
Shifu, open another scroll or something.
Dad, you heard what Shifu said Oogway said.
This guy can only be stopped by a master of chi.
translation.ko: 기를 가진 사부만이 막을 수 있댔어요

translation.en: And I can only master chi by knowing who I really am.
translation.ko: 내 본모습을 알아야 기를 터득할 수 있대요

translation.en: I'll pack you a lunch for the road.
Do you really think Po can master chi in time?
translation.ko: 포가 기를 제때 터득할 거라고 보세요?

translation.en: Doesn't matter what I think. It only matters what the universe thinks.
translation.ko: 내 생각은 상관없어 우주의 판단에 달렸어

translation.en: Master, what are we going to do?
You are going to find out where Kai is.
Follow the trail of those jade creatures.
for with every foe he faces, Kai becomes stronger.
translation.ko: 우리를 꺾는 족족 더 강해질 테니까

translation.en: Why me? Is it because I asked?
No. It is because you can fly. Go!
translation.ko: 아니, 넌 날 수 있잖아 가거라

translation.en: Should have kept your beak shut. [chuckles]
What? Oh, man. Is it because I...
-Ah... You don't need to ask me twice. -[muffled] Ow.
What am I doing? Getting a backache.
Did you have to step on every rock?
No, I mean, why are you here?
What was I supposed to do, huh? What if the pandas don't have food you like?
translation.ko: 거기에 네가 좋아하는 음식이 없으면 어떡해

translation.en: You're never gonna be able to save the world on an empty stomach.
I consider my presence mission critical.
We can't share the location of the village with others. So...
Well, you think I can't keep a secret, huh?
translation.ko: 내가 비밀 하나 못 지킬 것 같소?

translation.en: I raised Po for 20 years before I finally told him he was adopted.
Okay. I guess it would be cruel to make you fly back.
translation.ko: 그럼 날아서 돌아가게 할 순 없겠군요

translation.en: Sure looks like a long ways up there.
We're pandas. We don't do stairs.
I've waited my whole life to hear those words.
translation.ko: 평생 그 말을 미치도록 듣고 싶었어요

translation.en: This is the secret panda village?
No wonder you keep it a secret.
If I lived here, I wouldn't tell anyone either.
-My turn! My turn! -Come on, faster, faster!

translation.ko: - 그들이 돌아왔어요 - 근데 왜 뛰는 건데?

translation.en: Everyone, gather around! This is my son!
-Your fur is soft. -He smells like cookies.
He's so handsome, just like his father.
Ah... We'll make you another one.
I don't know who you are.
Okay, careful with that. That's my action figure.
...problem. Of course. Yeah. That's why I brought her.
-Take good care of her. -Yes! Stripy Baby. [giggles]
translation.ko: 잘 가지고 놀아 응! 아기 호랑이

translation.en: You look just like me, but a baby.
Let's feast in my son's honor.
Have you ever seen anyone look so ridiculous?
translation.ko: 저렇게 웃긴 거 본 적 있기나 하니?

translation.en: Po, what are you doing? Po!
You're right, that is better than walking.
Yeah, that's the good stuff. Have some dumplings.
What kind of panda doesn't know how to roll?
Well, I'm kind of new at this whole "being a panda" thing.
Hey, what kind of panda are you?
translation.ko: 진짜 팬더 체험이 처음이거든! 아저씬 무슨 팬더예요? 목이 웃기게 생겼어요
아저씬 무슨 팬더예요? 목이 웃기게 생겼어요

translation.en: I'm not a panda at all.
-What's that? What's that? -My hat. My beak.
No more questions! Go away, kid.
Here, son. I packed your chopsticks.
These? These are chopsticks. They're for picking up dumplings.
translation.ko: 이거? 젓가락이야 만두 먹을 때 쓰지

translation.en: You mean you only eat one at a time?
I knew I wasn't eating up to my potential!
Wow, she's amazing. She's so beautiful.
But please, try to save all other compliments until after the performance.
translation.ko: 더 칭찬하고 싶으면 공연 끝나고서 해줘

translation.en: Best ribbon dancer in the world!
At least, that's what she said.
Dad, why does she keep staring at me like... that!
translation.ko: 왜 날 뚫어지게 볼까요? 저런 눈으로!

translation.en: I don't really know how to dance!
Of course, you do. All pandas dance.
-I know what you were thinking. -You do?
"How can one panda be so beautiful?"
-Help me, Dads. -Yeah, no, you're on your own.
Don't worry. You'll get the hang of it.
I have so much to learn.
Just because you say "Wings of" before something,
it doesn't mean that you're doing a special move.
It's like me saying "Antenna of Power"

translation.ko: 더듬이 파워나 샌드위치용 가슴이라고 하는 거 같아

translation.en: Master Bear, Master Chicken, Master Croc! What are you doing out here?
translation.ko: 곰, 닭, 악어 사부님! 여기서 뭐 하세요?

translation.en: [squawks] Jade creatures attacked our villages. We've tracked them here.
-We've gotta get in there. -But Master Shifu said...
Even Master Chicken's going in there! And he's a chicken.
-That's it. I'm going in. -Mantis! We have orders not to...
They need our help! Come on. I'll go high, you go low.
translation.ko: 우리의 도움이 필요해 - 난 높게, 넌 낮게! - 잠깐!

translation.en: Antenna of Power! Ah! It didn't work!
I'll put your chi to good use...
destroying the Jade Palace and everyone in it.
Oh, yeah. First day of panda training!
I'm ready for my first day of panda training.
-What? -You know, learn to be a panda, master chi, save the world!
So lesson number one is, "Go back to bed."
Nobody said this was gonna be easy.
translation.ko: 쉽지 않을 거란 건 알고 있었어

translation.en: Can you do this? Can you do that?
How about this? How about that?
Am I doing it? Is this good?
You gotta let the hill tell you where to roll.
Dim, Sum, let's show him how we go uphill!
What are you doing there? That food is for Po!
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 그건 포의 몫이야

translation.en: Just let yourself fall into it.
There we go. Just let it all out.
Let me get some of that.
What are you guys looking at?
Now, you try again. But don't try so hard.
You know, just for, you know, showing me what it feels like
-So, when do you think I'll be ready? -Ready?
You know, to learn how to master chi.
Come on, I wanna show you something else. Come on.
translation.ko: 이리 와 봐 보여줄 게 있단다 어서

translation.en: Sorry about the mess. I don't usually get visitors.
translation.ko: 지저분해서 미안 손님이 거의 없다 보니

translation.en: I had this done on your 100th day.
Your momma couldn't hold you still.
She was the love of my life.
And then, just when I thought I couldn't get any luckier,
translation.ko: 더할 나위 없을 만큼 행복할 때

translation.en: along you came. My Little Lotus.
You don't have to worry about losing me ever again.
translation.ko: 두 번 다시 저를 잃을 일은 없을 거예요

translation.en: Let me get some of that.
Master Lizard, Master Ox, Master Eagle. All of them.
In every village from the sea to here, every master in China...
translation.ko: 바다에서 이곳까지 모든 마을의 모든 사부가 다

translation.en: -Maybe they are all at a party. -Monkey.
We are all that stand between him...
and the knowledge Oogway left in our care.
How dare you set foot on these grounds!
Groveling at the feet of Oogway the Magnificent.
You are not fit to speak his name.
translation.ko: 넌 그분 이름을 말할 자격 없어

translation.en: I am not fit, little kitten?
I loved him like a brother.
Now I will destroy everything he has created!
How's that for a little kitten?
I will not let you destroy Oogway's memory.
translation.ko: 스승님 조각상을 부수게 놔둘 것 같나?
못 놔두면? 그는 내 모든 걸 부쉈어

translation.en: Mantis. It is me, your bestie!
I will show you the true power of chi, brother.
[chuckles] Hmm, what do you say, Oogway?
You may have destroyed the Jade Palace,
There will always be someone to stop you.
translation.ko: 널 막을 누군가가 항상 있을 거다

translation.en: His chi is strong... but it won't be enough.
translation.ko: 놈의 기는 강하지만 그 정도 가지곤 어림없어

translation.en: He will meet the same fate as you.
translation.ko: 놈도 너의 운명을 따르게 될 거야

translation.en: -No. -And so will every panda in that village.
translation.ko: 천만에! 그 마을 팬더들도 모두 다

translation.en: He's taken every master in China, including Shifu and the others.
translation.ko: 시푸 사부님을 포함한 모든 사부의 기를 뺏어갔어

translation.en: It's all gone, Po. Everything. Everyone.
And now he's on his way here. He's after you, Po.
translation.ko: 여기로 오고 있어 널 노리는 거야

translation.en: Please, tell me you've mastered chi.
Okay, who belongs to this one?
You need to teach me the secret chi technique now!
No, no, I'm afraid you need more time.
Everyone, go get your things! Let me help you with that.
I don't have more time. I need to learn it now!
What are you talking about? I've done everything you've asked.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리예요? 시키는 건 다 했잖아요

translation.en: I've mastered napping, sleeping in, hammocks, hot tubs.
translation.ko: 늦잠 자기, 낮잠 자기 온천욕까지 섭렵했다고요!

translation.en: I am totally at one with my panda parts. Now why won't you show me?
translation.ko: 진짜 팬더가 됐는데 왜 안 가르쳐주세요?

translation.en: -You what? -I don't know it, okay? No one does.
translation.ko: 뭐라고요? 난 모른다고, 됐어? 아무도 몰라

translation.en: Maybe we used to. But... But not anymore.
I find out some blade-swinging maniac is coming for you.
What am I supposed to do? Just let that happen?
Yes! I'm the Dragon Warrior. Facing maniacs, that's my job!
translation.ko: 네! 전 용의 전사고 놈들을 상대하는 게 일이에요!

translation.en: But because of you, I left the Valley unprotected.
I left my friends unprotected! And now they're all...
translation.ko: 친구들도 지켜주지 못했어요 지금 그들은 다...

translation.en: -They're all... -And you would have been, too.
translation.ko: 전부 다... 너 또한 그렇게 됐겠지

translation.en: I am not going to lose you again.
Po, I'm so worried for you that I can't even enjoy being right about everything.
translation.ko: 네가 너무 걱정돼서 내가 맞았다는 걸 좋아할 수가 없었어

translation.en: Now run, run, run, as fast as those chubby legs can go!
But what are you going to do?
I'm gonna stay, and fight that monster.
Po, he may be a monster, but he's still your father.
translation.ko: 잘못한 건 맞지만 그래도 네 아빠잖니?

translation.en: You know, you weren't the only one who was lying.

translation.ko: 네? 난 포가 배고플까 봐 걱정돼서 온 게 아녜요

translation.en: because I was worried Po would go hungry.
translation.ko: 난 포가 배고플까 봐 걱정돼서 온 게 아녜요

translation.en: I was worried you'd steal Po from me.

translation.ko: 내가 어째요? 알아요 쓸데없는 걱정인 거

translation.en: But I realize having you in Po's life doesn't mean less for me.
translation.ko: 댁이 포와 만났다고 해서 내가 아들을 잃는 건 아니죠

translation.en: Well, I'm not in his life.
translation.ko: 난 아들 인생을 논할 자격이 없소

translation.en: Your son got mad at you.
You don't understand. I lied to him.
translation.ko: 당신은 이해 못 해요 난 아들을 속였어요

translation.en: I lied to him for 20 years.
He still thinks he came from an egg.
translation.ko: 아직도 자기가 알을 깨고 나온 줄 알죠

translation.en: Sometimes, we do the wrong things for the right reasons.
translation.ko: 우린 때론 선의를 위해 옳지 않은 일도 해요

translation.en: And he still has to save the world.

translation.ko: 지금 포는 두 아빠가 모두 필요해요

translation.en: -This isn't going to work. -It has to.
translation.ko: 그 정도론 안 돼 돼야만 해

translation.en: I've seen Kai. I've seen what he can do.
translation.ko: 난 카이를 봤어 그의 능력도 봤고

translation.en: But he hasn't seen what I can do.
translation.ko: 하지만 그는 아직 내 능력을 못 봤잖아

translation.en: It's my best move. I just have to get to Kai,
translation.ko: 내 필살기야 카이에게 다가가서 손가락 끝을 잡고 빠샤!

translation.en: grab his finger and then skadoosh! Back to the Spirit Realm.
translation.ko: 카이에게 다가가서 손가락 끝을 잡고 빠샤! 그를 영혼계로 돌려보내겠어

translation.en: He has an army of jade warriors.
Everything they see, he sees. So there's no sneaking up on him.
translation.ko: 다 보고 있어서 접근할 수조차 없어

translation.en: -You will never get close enough. -It's gonna work!
translation.ko: 손가락은 잡을 수도 없을 거야 할 수 있어

translation.en: He can only be stopped by a master of chi.
translation.ko: 기를 가진 사부만이 막을 수 있어

translation.en: Oh, you sound just like Shifu with the, "Chi, chi, chi."
translation.ko: 말하는 게 사부님 같아 그놈의 기
이래도 기, 저래도 기 맨날 기 타령!

translation.en: I'm not a master of chi, okay?
I don't know if I'm the Dragon Warrior. I don't even know if I'm a panda!
translation.ko: 내가 용의 전사가 맞는지 팬더이긴 한 건지 모르겠어

translation.en: I don't know who I am!
There's no way I can stop him and his army.
Unless you had an army of your own.
I finally found my son, after all these years.
It's going to take a lot more than the end of the world to keep us apart.
translation.ko: 하늘이 두 동강 난다 해도 이젠 안 헤어져

translation.en: But you don't even know kung fu.
What? I can't teach you kung fu.
I couldn't even teach Tigress. And she already knows kung fu!
translation.ko: 이미 쿵푸를 하는 타이그리스도 못 가르쳤어요

translation.en: Po, I know I'm the last guy you wanna trust right now.
translation.ko: 네가 지금 날 못 믿는 건 알아

translation.en: But you gotta believe me. We can do this.
translation.ko: 하지만 믿어야 해 우린 할 수 있어

translation.en: We can be just like you!
Uh... "We can be just like you"?
But you don't have to be!
I don't have to turn you into me. I have to turn you into you!
translation.ko: '남처럼 되려 하지 말고 진정한 네가 돼라'

translation.en: I'm gonna do something I never thought I'd be able to do.
translation.ko: 할 수 없을 거라고 생각했던 걸 할 거예요

translation.en: You guys, your real strength comes from being the best "you" you can be.
translation.ko: 진짜 힘은 가장 자기 자신다울 때 나와요

translation.en: Hug that log like it's the last time you're ever gonna hug it goodbye forever.
translation.ko: 다시는 못 껴안을 것처럼 꽉 안아!

translation.en: Higher! And a little more to the left this time. You can do it!
translation.ko: 더 높이, 약간 왼쪽! 넌 할 수 있어

translation.en: I don't wanna see any of these hit the ground!
Good! Now try it with these.
Okay, pay attention because I'm only gonna go over this ten more times.
The only entrance to the village is here.
The dumpling squadron will take position here,
while the cookie squadron will take position here.
Now, on my signal, the two squadrons will...
Okay. Anyway, the important thing to remember is that this is the spot where...
translation.ko: 좋아, 꼭 명심할 점은 이 지점에서...

translation.en: If you only remember one thing, it's distract the jombies
until I get close enough to put a Wuxi Finger Hold on Kai.
translation.ko: 그 틈에 난 필살기로 카이를 꺾을게

translation.en: Pandas on three! One, two three, Pan...
You guys... Never mind, I'll teach you that later.
I wish I could have taught you this, son.
That's what I call a Dramatic Entrance!
Ha ha! You must be the Dragon Warrior.
Beast of Vengeance, Maker of Widows!
Almost makes me wanna spare your life.
How about you spare me the chit-chat? All right? Let's do this.
I'm going to take your chi,
then the chi of every panda in the...
You guys have all been turned green!
Except for you, Mantis. You were already green.
translation.ko: 맨티스, 넌 빼고 넌 원래 초록이니까

translation.en: Spring Roll Squad! Time for some takeout!
translation.ko: 스프링 롤 부대! 좀비 박멸 개시!

translation.en: I don't know who you are, either.
Get ready to dance... with danger!
translation.ko: 나랑 춤출 자는 목숨 걸고 나와

translation.en: Sorry, buddy. Gotta send you back to the Spirit Realm.
Okay, that didn't work. Let me try one more time.
Skadoosh! Skadoosh. Skadoosh. Skadoo... What the...
Did Oogway teach you that little trick?
And I am a Spirit Warrior.
this was the one destined to stop me?
You really thought you could send me back to the Spirit Realm?
translation.ko: 날 영혼계로 추방할 수 있을 거라고?

translation.en: You are just a stupid mortal.
You're right. I can't send you there.
But I can take you there.
He took Kai away. He saved us.
He saved us, but who's saving him?
Don't blame me. I tried to finish this in the regular realm.
translation.ko: 내 탓 하지 마 난 거기서 끝내려 했어

translation.en: We have to help him! Okay. Everyone gather around.
That's it. Come in close. Come on.
You taught us who we were meant to be.
translation.ko: 넌 우리의 진짜 모습을 일깨워 줬어

translation.en: I've been asking the same question.
translation.ko: 나도 같은 질문을 여러 번 했었지

translation.en: Am I the son of a panda?
Get it? See the giant dragon?
Get ready to feel the thunder.
It took me 500 years to take Oogway's chi.
I will have yours if it takes me 500 more.
You want my chi so bad...
I'm still green! It didn't work!
translation.ko: 난 아직 초록색이야 저주가 안 풀렸어

translation.en: Oh, wait. That's my normal green.
Not a baby. Not a baby!
I know, right? It's like the best cape ever.
When I run with it, then it looks really cool.
translation.ko: 이걸 두르고 뛰면 진짜 멋져 보여요

translation.en: Yep. I gotta lay off the panda buffet.
as I hoped you would when I sent the message to your father.
translation.ko: 그러길 바라며 네 아빠에게 메시지를 보냈지

translation.en: [gasps] You sent the universe mail. Whoa!
You finally became the panda you were always meant to be.
But, how'd you know I could?
translation.ko: 제가 할 수 있을 거란 건 어떻게 아셨죠?

translation.en: On the first day we met,
I saw the future of kung fu.
I saw the panda who could unite them both.
translation.ko: 그리고 그 둘을 이어줄 팬더도 보았지

translation.en: That is why I chose you, Po.
Both sides of a Yin and Yang.
Just take it. I have a bigger one.
translation.ko: 받거라, 난 더 큰 게 있어

translation.en: I mean, you're enlightened and everything. I'm just...
translation.ko: 대사부님은 모든 걸 아시지만 전 고작...

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere. I live here.
translation.ko: 아무 데도 안 가 난 여기 살거든

translation.en: It's you who must decide whether to stay or go.
Don't you go disappearing in petals ever again.
The student has truly become the tea... Wait. Where did you get that?
translation.ko: 마침내 스승으로... 가만, 그건 어디서 났어?

translation.en: Oh, this. Oogway gave it to me in the Spirit Realm.
